- [ ] If it's an issue with a Python check, please open the issue in the [integrations-core repo](https://github.com/datadog/integrations-core) or the [integrations-extras repo](https://github.com/datadog/integrations-extras).

If you are reporting a new issue, make sure that we do not have any duplicates
already open. You can ensure this by searching the issue list for this
repository. If there is a duplicate, please close your issue and add a comment
to the existing issue instead.

If you suspect your issue is a bug, please edit your issue description to
include the BUG REPORT INFORMATION shown below.

You do NOT have to include this information if this is a FEATURE REQUEST
